languages.text: "Господин Винтерскейл так верил в своего друга, что добровольно ринулся навстречу опасности! Это... благородный поступок".
"Lord Winterscale had so much faith in his friend that he willingly rushed headlong into danger! An honourable act."
languages.original_text: "Господин Винтерскейл так верил в своего друга, что добровольно ринулся навстречу опасности! Это... благородный поступок".

traits.locale_text: "Lord Winterscale had so much faith in his friend that he willingly rushed headlong into danger! An honourable act."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Lord Winterscale had so much faith in his friend that he willingly rushed headlong into danger! An honourable act."

traits.locale_text: "Lord Winterscale had so much faith in his friend that he willingly rushed headlong into danger! An honourable act."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: “温特斯凯尔大人真的很相信他的朋友，他甚至愿意为此一头冲进危险之中！这是何等的光荣之举。”
languages.original_text: "Lord Winterscale had so much faith in his friend that he willingly rushed headlong into danger! An honourable act."

traits.locale_text: “温特斯凯尔大人真的很相信他的朋友，他甚至愿意为此一头冲进危险之中！这是何等的光荣之举。”
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: « Le seigneur Winterscale doit avoir une confiance absolue en ses amis pour s'être jeté ainsi au cœur du danger. Il a agi avec honneur. »
languages.original_text: "Lord Winterscale had so much faith in his friend that he willingly rushed headlong into danger! An honourable act."

traits.locale_text: « Le seigneur Winterscale doit avoir une confiance absolue en ses amis pour s'être jeté ainsi au cœur du danger. Il a agi avec honneur. »
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Lord Winterzunder hatte so viel Vertrauen in seinen Freund, dass er willentlich der Gefahr entgegengestürmt ist! Höchst ehrenwert."
languages.original_text: "Lord Winterscale had so much faith in his friend that he willingly rushed headlong into danger! An honourable act."

traits.locale_text: "Lord Winterzunder hatte so viel Vertrauen in seinen Freund, dass er willentlich der Gefahr entgegengestürmt ist! Höchst ehrenwert."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: 「ウィンタースケール卿は友人を厚く信頼しているがゆえに、進んで危険の中に飛び込んでいったのです！名誉ある行為です」
languages.original_text: "Lord Winterscale had so much faith in his friend that he willingly rushed headlong into danger! An honourable act."

traits.locale_text: 「ウィンタースケール卿は友人を厚く信頼しているがゆえに、進んで危険の中に飛び込んでいったのです！名誉ある行為です」
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: «¡Lord Winterscale tenía tanta fe en su amigo que se lanzó de cabeza al peligro! Es un acto honorable».
languages.original_text: "Lord Winterscale had so much faith in his friend that he willingly rushed headlong into danger! An honourable act."

traits.locale_text: «¡Lord Winterscale tenía tanta fe en su amigo que se lanzó de cabeza al peligro! Es un acto honorable».
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.original_text: "Lord Winterscale had so much faith in his friend that he willingly rushed headlong into danger! An honourable act."

languages.text: "Lord Winterscale dostuna öylesine güveniyordu ki gözünü kırpmadan canını tehlikeye attı! Ne yüce gönüllü bir davranış."
languages.original_text: "Lord Winterscale had so much faith in his friend that he willingly rushed headlong into danger! An honourable act."
